title: Not working
body:
I followed the steps for the instalation of this extension on Twidere but when I try to send one message with more than 140 characters this error message appear:
- "Error 186: Status is over 140 characters"

Maybe a Twitter update broke the extension?

title: Add button "Get it on F-Droid"
body: Please add a button with "Get it on F-Droid" in the README.md like was done for https://github.com/TwidereProject/Twidere-Android Also add link to this app in the F-Droid website.

title: Does not work with Twidere 0.2.9.4
body: I installed v1.3 of the Twitlonger extension, yet it doesn't appear in Twidere's Settings->Extensions
